name: Boreas’ Chosen
description: Boreas’ Chosen is characterized by its chaotic evil nature and exceptional physical abilities, marked by its strength and resilience. Clad in leather armor and using a shield, it stands ready for battle. It can inflict cold damage and is particularly challenging to defeat.
memorable: Immunity to cold damage and the ability to petrify enemies with freezing breath make Boreas' Chosen a uniquely formidable opponent.
goals: To dominate and defeat foes on icy terrains.
relations: Might serve under powerful ice entities or allies in cold environments.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage, high Constitution, and powerful cold-infused attacks.
weaknesses: Low intelligence may hinder strategic choices.
attacks: Utilizes spear attacks for piercing and cold damage, and boasts a freezing breath attack that can incapacitate enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Breath of the North Wind, capable of petrifying foes with ice.
senses: Has a passive Perception score of 12.
skills: Shows exceptional skill in Athletics, Survival, and moderate proficiency in Intimidation.
additional_information: Can easily traverse icy surfaces ignoring difficult terrain.
Deals additional cold damage with weapon attacks due to Ice Runes.
Inflicts cold damage to melee attackers through Frozen Blood ability.
Highly durable with significant hit points and defenses.
Resistant to some physical damage types.

tough enemy found in icy terrains
